column5: Hey everyone thanks for all the input on the dogs. Finally decided on a jug (JACK RUSSEL X PUG). Here is "Tucker"
Tucker looks "nice and comfortable" there  congrats on the.... ... Errrrr dog!...  G
Dog...where...
i dont see a dog just a couple puppies!  nice lookin pup ya got there!
Aww isn't that cute.....  O....... The dog looks nice too   Where are the back alley drag races being held?
I concur..nice puppies!

Awesome, you'll love him.  I thought a Puggle was Beagle x Pug, no? According to Puggle.org it is anyway. Don't worry though, Beagles are awesome regardless of what people say.  Enjoy the new pup, I had one this time last year!
sorry you were right it is beagle pug mix i have a "Jug" lol
"today's shows about the puggle"
very cool a wheezzing tornado.
Awwwww.... thats just not fair LA!.....  G
Nice looking pup,  congrats!
thanks!

That's a good looking dog you got there. I had mine out in the kayak today to see how she would be. She is almost 6 months and was a little nervous to start. After awhile she relaxed and enjoyed watching the ducks and turtles.

Glad to hear it! The dog i got wont be here because hes not old enough yet.He has to get a vet check on the 31st of april then ill have him around may 10th! When i take the annual trip up to nipissing i would love nothing more for my dog to come out with us on the boat,but no dogs so we have to leave him with a friend who lives in washago by the black river i think.
Good Deal LA.  Nuttin' like a new puppy to keep things interesting.  Hope ya have many, many happy years together.   Congrats and break out the newspapers.
Nice lookin' pup LA   ....looks like he's old enough now to get into some real "MAN" training before May 6th like my boys did....
Who doesn't luv puppies ??  Treat him well Little Angler and he'll be the best friend you'll ever have !!!!
Nice choice.  Consider fishing where your dog is welcome.
Awwwww.......... Very cute!
Ill get right on that! hahaha hes only gonna grow about 10-13 inches
